issue.title: Allow saving of world with current robot pose

content.raw:
Gazebo currently saves model poses and link poses, but due to [gazebo issue 312](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/issue/312/re-enable-physics-states-test), loading the poses of all the child links in a model is not working.

To verify, load an empty world with `double_pendulum_with_base`, simulate forward so it is no longer in its initial configuration, save the world (yay), then load it in a new gazebo instance. Looking at the saved world file will show link states not at the initial configuration, and the model pose should be correct (initial starting point of the base), but the configuration of the child links will be reverted to the initial configuration rather than the saved configuration.
